name: Satomi no Nazo
overview: Satomi no Nazo is a classic 2D Rpg that features the story of a young boy that get involved into a difficult task when he knows about a dangerous cult is trying to destroy the world, now is up to him and his dog to travel acroos different places and try to stop them. During his journey he will meet other characters that will join his group. Some of the game characters are Saya, Izumi, Grumpy (the dog) or Haeckel. The game at the beginning let the player choose between two posible girl characters (one a 16 years old one and another one of 14 years old). The gameplay is about exploring the different places and talk to the characters to advance in the game and in the battles each button attack an enemy, and other button make other actions.
